verses.verse: Moreover, <S%H1732>David<s%> and the <S%H8269>commanders<s%> of the <S%H6635>army<s%> <S%H914>set<s%> <S%H914>apart<s%> for the <S%H5656>service<s%> [some] of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph<s%> and of <S%H1968>Heman<s%> and of <S%H3038>Jeduthun,<s%> who [were] to <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> with <S%H3658>lyres,<s%> <S%H5035>harps,<s%> and <S%H4700>cymbals;<s%> and the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H376>those<s%> who <S%H4399>performed<s%> their <S%H5656>service<s%> was:

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph:<s%> <S%H2139>Zaccur,<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H5418>Nethaniah,<s%> and <S%H841>Asharelah;<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph<s%> [were] <S%H5921>under<s%> the <S%H3027>direction<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph,<s%> who <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> <S%H5921>under<s%> the <S%H3027>direction<s%> of the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

Of <S%H3038>Jeduthun,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3038>Jeduthun:<s%> <S%H9072>Gedaliah,<s%> <S%H6874>Zeri,<s%> <S%H9198>Jeshaiah,<s%> Shimei, <S%H2811>Hashabiah,<s%> and <S%H4993>Mattithiah,<s%> <S%H8337>six,<s%> <S%H5921>under<s%> the <S%H3027>direction<s%> of their father <S%H1>Jeduthun<s%> with the <S%H3038>harp,<s%> who <S%H3658>prophesied<s%> in <S%H5012>giving<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> and <S%H3034>praising<s%> the <S%H1984>Lord.<s%>

Of <S%H1968>Heman,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1968>Heman:<s%> <S%H1232>Bukkiah,<s%> <S%H4983>Mattaniah,<s%> <S%H5816>Uzziel,<s%> <S%H7619>Shebuel<s%> and <S%H3406>Jerimoth,<s%> <S%H2608>Hananiah,<s%> <S%H2607>Hanani,<s%> <S%H448>Eliathah,<s%> <S%H1437>Giddalti<s%> and Romamti-ezer, <S%H3436>Joshbekashah,<s%> <S%H4413>Mallothi,<s%> <S%H1956>Hothir,<s%> <S%H4238>Mahazioth.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> [were] the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1968>Heman<s%> the king's <S%H2374>seer<s%> to <S%H7311>exalt<s%> him according to the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> for <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to <S%H1968>Heman.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> were <S%H5921>under<s%> the <S%H3027>direction<s%> of their father to <S%H1>sing<s%> in the <S%H7892>house<s%> of the <S%H1004>Lord,<s%> with <S%H3068>cymbals,<s%> <S%H4700>harps<s%> and <S%H5035>lyres,<s%> for the <S%H3658>service<s%> of the <S%H5656>house<s%> of <S%H1004>God.<s%> <S%H430>Asaph,<s%> <S%H623>Jeduthun<s%> and <S%H3038>Heman<s%> [were] <S%H1968>under<s%> the <S%H5921>direction<s%> of the <S%H3027>king.<s%>

And their <S%H4557>number<s%> who were <S%H3925>trained<s%> in <S%H7892>singing<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> with their <S%H251>relatives,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> who were <S%H995>skillful,<s%> [was] 288.

And they <S%H5307>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%> for their <S%H4931>duties,<s%> <S%H5980>all<s%> <S%H5980>alike,<s%> the <S%H9512>small<s%> as well as the <S%H1419>great,<s%> the <S%H995>teacher<s%> [as well] as the <S%H8527>pupil.<s%>

Now the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out for <S%H623>Asaph<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> for <S%H9072>Gedaliah,<s%> he with his <S%H251>relatives<s%> and <S%H1121>sons<s%> [were] <S%H8147>twelve<s%><S%H6240>;<s%>
the <S%H7992>third<s%> to <S%H2139>Zaccur,<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H251>relatives,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%><S%H6240>;<s%>
the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> to <S%H3339>Izri,<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H251>relatives,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%><S%H6240>;<s%>
the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> to <S%H5418>Nethaniah,<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H251>relatives,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%><S%H6240>;<s%>
the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> to <S%H1232>Bukkiah,<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H251>relatives,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%><S%H6240>;<s%>
the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> to <S%H3480>Jesharelah,<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H251>relatives,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%><S%H6240>;<s%>
the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> to <S%H9198>Jeshaiah,<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H251>relatives,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%><S%H6240>;<s%>
the <S%H8671>ninth<s%> to <S%H4983>Mattaniah,<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H251>relatives,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%><S%H6240>;<s%>
the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> to <S%H8096>Shimei,<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H251>relatives,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%><S%H6240>;<s%>
the <S%H6249>eleventh<s%> <S%H6240><s%> to <S%H5832>Azarel,<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H251>relatives,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%><S%H6240>;<s%>
the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> to <S%H2811>Hashabiah,<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H251>relatives,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%><S%H6240>;<s%>
for the <S%H7969>thirteenth,<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H7619>Shubael,<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H251>relatives,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%><S%H6240>;<s%>
for the <S%H702>fourteenth,<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H4993>Mattithiah,<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H251>relatives,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%><S%H6240>;<s%>
for the <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> to <S%H3406>Jeremoth,<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H251>relatives,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%><S%H6240>;<s%>
for the <S%H8337>sixteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> to <S%H2608>Hananiah,<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H251>relatives,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%><S%H6240>;<s%>
for the <S%H7651>seventeenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> to <S%H3436>Joshbekashah,<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H251>relatives,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%><S%H6240>;<s%>
for the <S%H8083>eighteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> to <S%H2607>Hanani,<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H251>relatives,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%><S%H6240>;<s%>
for the <S%H8672>nineteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> to <S%H4413>Mallothi,<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H251>relatives,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%><S%H6240>;<s%>
for the <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> to <S%H448>Eliathah,<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H251>relatives,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%><S%H6240>;<s%>
for the twenty-first to <S%H1956>Hothir,<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H251>relatives,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%><S%H6240>;<s%>
for the twenty-second to <S%H1437>Giddalti,<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H251>relatives,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%><S%H6240>;<s%>
for the twenty-third to <S%H4238>Mahazioth,<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H251>relatives,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%><S%H6240>;<s%>
for the twenty-fourth to Romamti-ezer, his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H251>relatives,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve.<s%> <S%H6240><s%>
